name: !Hexagonal Merge - Premium
description:
Please Note: This game is paid, ads free, no IAP, small app size, more functionality and better user experience.

The objective of this game is simple : Drag/drop colored blocks to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Be careful not to keep the hex blocks from filling the screen.

Fill all the grids with the matching colored blocks and enjoy this cool strategy game.

Game Features :-

* Awesome gameplay
* Clean UI
* Nice music and sound effects
* Cool animations
* No IAP, no ads and much more....

No time limit, no color match! Just merge and destroy colored blocks to score points and have fun....
